posts.post_content:
Posted By: Dwight
(SOLD) Card has been in my collection of T206s for years. I honestly can't determine if it's trimmed. I'm sure most of you can. Definitely off-center. If interested, make an offer.
Thanks.

Nice card, I would say not trimmed just off-center.  Good luck!

Thank you Pete for the snap pay. Enjoy the card and the holder.
